text: Ivan Dodig was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title. Daniil Medvedev won the title after defeating Joris De Loore 6–3, 6–3 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Trophée des Alpilles - Singles 2016 Trophée des Alpilles - Singles
title: 2016 Trophée des Alpilles – Singles
